title: NVIDIA Corp. stock falls Friday, still outperforms market
text:
Shares of NVIDIA Corp. 
        NVDA,
        +0.12%
       slid 0.12% to $878.36 Friday, on what proved to be an all-around grim trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        +0.11%
       falling 0.65% to 5,117.09 and Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        +0.12%
       falling 0.49% to 38,714.77. This was the stock's third consecutive day of losses. NVIDIA Corp. closed $95.64 below its 52-week high ($974.00), which the company achieved on March 8th. Trading volume (63.2 M) eclipsed its 50-day average volume of 53.8 M. Editor's Note: This story was auto-generated by Automated Insights, an automation technology provider, using data from Dow Jones and FactSet.  See our market data terms of use. The stock looks like a bet on Trump himself more than a company with significant revenue and profits.
